text:
ISBN-13: 9780307236012.

Title: The Deeper Meaning of Liff.
Subtitle: A Dictionary of Things There Aren't Any Words for Yet-- But There Ought to be.
Authors: Douglas Adams;John Lloyd.
Categories: Humor.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=TVFPmAEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Presents a dictionary of such items as "Tingrith," or the feeling of aluminum foil against your fillings, and "Ahenny," the way people stand when examining other people's bookshelves..
Published Year: 2005.
